mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , R.NO R_NO , R.MEMBER_NO R_MEMBER_NO , R.COMMUNITY_NO , R.BODY R_BODY , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyymmdd') = 0 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'hh24:ss') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyymmdd') >= 10000 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'MM-DD') END) R_REGIST_DATE , R.PARENT_REPLY_NO , R.LOVE_COUNT , R.HATE_COUNT , C.NO C_NO , C.TITLE , C.BODY C_BODY , C.VIEW_COUNT , C.RECOMMEND_COUNT , C.REQUEST_IP , C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME , C.MEMBER_NO C_MEMBER_NO , R_M.NO M_NO , R_M.NICKNAME , R_M.ID , R_M.REGIST_DATE M_REGIST_DATE FROM REPLY R , COMMUNITY C , MEMBER R_M , MEMBER C_M WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = R_M.NO AND R.COMMUNITY_NO = C.NO AND C_M.NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND R.COMMUNITY_NO = #{communityNo} START WITH R.PARENT_REPLY_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR R.NO = R.PARENT_REPLY_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY R.NO ASC

SELECT R.NO R_NO , R.MEMBER_NO R_MEMBER_NO , R.COMMUNITY_NO , R.BODY R_BODY , (CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyymmdd') = 0 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'hh24:ss') WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') - TO_CHAR((R.REGIST_DATE),'yyyymmdd') >= 10000 THEN TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(R.REGIST_DATE,'MM-DD') END) R_REGIST_DATE , R.PARENT_REPLY_NO , R.LOVE_COUNT , R.HATE_COUNT , C.NO C_NO , C.TITLE , C.BODY C_BODY , C.VIEW_COUNT , C.RECOMMEND_COUNT , C.REQUEST_IP , C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME , C.MEMBER_NO C_MEMBER_NO , R_M.NO M_NO , R_M.NICKNAME , R_M.ID , R_M.REGIST_DATE M_REGIST_DATE FROM REPLY R , COMMUNITY C , MEMBER C_M , MEMBER R_M WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = R_M.NO AND R.COMMUNITY_NO = C.NO AND C_M.NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND R.NO = #{replyNo}
